Class Product

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.util.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Product>, ConfigurationSerializable
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Product extends Object implements ConfigurationSerializable, Comparable<Product>, Serializable
